name: Agaseous- SuperWikia Font Deployment
short_description: Agaseous is the premiere font & text management program for SuperWikia Alpha. Add Text Asset Content (TAC's) to data constellations using import Autofont stylesheets. Spawn new glyph families, format text pages & embed into SuperWikia text applications.
